title: Study explaining side effects of statins finds drug can have unexpected benefits

title_detail.value: Study explaining side effects of statins finds drug can have unexpected benefits

summary: By suppressing the activity of key cellular receptors called G protein-coupled receptors (GPCRs) and their interacting partners called G proteins, statins have the potential to alter various bodily functions controlled by this important pathway, according to researchers.

summary_detail.value: By suppressing the activity of key cellular receptors called G protein-coupled receptors (GPCRs) and their interacting partners called G proteins, statins have the potential to alter various bodily functions controlled by this important pathway, according to researchers.
